HeadStart | The Challenge
Your Interview!
Ruth learns Salesforce!!!
Starbucks workshops: 18th & 19th February- interviews Easter- see link below New Look workshops: 21st March- interviews June/early July Lloyds workshop tbc- interviews June/early July
​We will be sending out all invitations for New Look and Lloyds in March/April .
If you would like to interview early please apply for Starbucks workshops to interview at Easter.
ALL jobs are for seasonal positions.
Click on a link below to reserve your place at one of the Starbucks workshops:
Wednesday, 18 February 2015 from 09:30 to 12:00
Wednesday, 18 February 2015 from 13:00 to 15:30
Thursday, 19 February 2015 from 09:30 to 12:00
Thursday, 19 February 2015 from 13:00 to 15:30
This workshop has been developed in partnership with Starbucks and will provide you with the opportunity to identify key qualities that contribute to good customer service. We strongly reccommend you attend this workshop to help prepare you for your interview. Please note there are only 30 places in each workshop. If you cannot attend do not reserve a space as you will be taking the place from someone else. What's Next? -AGL Workshop... IMPORTANT: There will be a compulsory information and Q&A session after each AGL workshop (workshop 3). This session will prepare you with the practical information you will need for your interview. Even if you cannot attend AGL, you must attend this session to be eligible for interview. Look out for an email invite soon. Invites for New Look and Lloyds will be sent out later in the month. Any questions? Email headstart@the-challenge.org
